name: Donald John Trump
married:
info:
Some fun facts about the 45th president of the Unites States:
1) Due to "behavior problems", Trump left school at age 13 and was enrolled in the New York Military Academy (NYMA), where he finished eighth grade and high school.
2) He has reportedly said that he " loves " nepotism
3) He began the birther movement
4) Word around the street is that "he" attacked Nancy Kerrigan, but this has never been proven.
5) He was on The Apprentice and Wrestle-mania
6) He supports both Jeff Sessions and Roy Moore.
Who could have known the collaplse of the American middle class would be so funny?

name: Ivana Trump
and they had:
children.info:
Ivana is a Czech-American businesswoman, fashion model, author, television personality. She is the first, and only age-appropriate, wife of Donald John Trump, the 45th President of the United States of America.
In a now-famous interview with ABC news, about her relationship with "the Donald" and the rest of the family, Ivana has reportedly said she has a direct phone line to the White House, she is the "true first lady"(contrary to what the media wants the rest of us to believe), and she fully believes both her daughter, Ivanka, and her husband, Jared, could become very competent US presidents in the future.
To red the rest of the interview, click here:

name: Donald Trump Jr.
who married:
children.info:
Not to be confused with his identically-looking brothers, Donald Jr. is the current co-CEO of his dad's Organisation and he is married with children. He believes in small government and the many health benefits of being in nature.
Unfortunately, due to the mass amnesia epidemic currently ravaging the White House senior staff, Donald Trump Jr. cannot recall anything about his life other than his children's Halloween costumes, so here's a picture of Chloe Sofia dressed as a police officer:

name: Vanessa Trump
and they had:
children.info:
"Vanessa Trump was born on December 18, 1977 in New York City, New York, USA as Vanessa Kay Haydon.
She is an actress, known for Something's Gotta Give (2003), The Apprentice USA (2004) and Bret Michaels: Life As I Know It (2010).
She has been married to Donald Trump Jr. since November 12, 2005. They have five children." source and other trivia:

name: Ivanka Trump
who married:
children.info:
Ivanka is a complicated woman and her accomplishments are many. Some of them are:
1) She has converted to Judeism to be with her husband, Jared.
2) She is a senior advisor to her father in the White House
3) She was the inspiration and champion of the famous " complicit " hastag, therefore, making her a certified pop and culture icon.
4) The name Ivanka is a diminutive form of Ivana.
5) She, also, runs a very successful line of fashion items, including clothes, handbags, shoes, and accessories, that was, unfortunately, dropped by Neiman Marcus and Nordstrom earlier in 2017.
This caused much distress to her father, Donald J. Trump, who accused the stores of treating his daughter unfairly. However, loyal Trump supporters came to he defence immediately, by boycotting the stores.
6) She is a published auther - no ghost-writers allowed here!

name: Eric Trump
who married:
children.info:
Eric Trump is the US President's second son and current co-CEO of the Trump Organisation,
a collective name of approximately 500 business entities of which Donald Trump is the sole or principal owner.
Eric is a very down-to-earth, child of divorce who, according to SNL, loves juice and cheerios.
Unfortunately, he's been involved in a scandal where Forbes is accusing the Eric Trump Foundation of redirecting donations destined for kids with cancer towards the family businesses and golf courses.
Of course, Eric denies the allegations and claims the research hospital was made aware of this well in advance.
CNBC cleared the confusion:
